summary: Add WorkflowInfo.runStartTime property to TypeScript SDK to match functionality available in Go and Java SDKs. This provides access to the workflow run start timestamp.
userImpact: TypeScript SDK users cannot access the workflow run start time, limiting visibility into workflow execution timing information available in other SDKs.
proposedFix: Add runStartTime property to WorkflowInfo class, matching the existing getRunStartedTimestampMillis() method in Java SDK.
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented and merged into the TypeScript SDK.
keyQuote: Add `WorkflowInfo.runStartTime` to match Go and Java SDK functionality
